attributes.action: BAN the use of fireworks in Domestic areas, unless at a Licensed Event
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people are nuisanced by fireworks that are let off in peoples gardens.  They are not properly trained and put the Emergency Services under intense pressure, as more accidents are caused through this, than if the fireworks were at a licensed/public event.

Animals are put at risk and the sanity of parents of young children.

Please listen to us, and BAN the use of fireworks in domestic areas.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
